strong.span: Starting Monday, April 6th, Kingston Public Schools will be delivering meals via the regular bus routes. The meals will be delivered on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from approximately 8:30-9:30 each day. Then, the buses willl proceed to the drop off locations and will be handing out the meals there from approximately 9:45 to 11:30. These drop off locations are listed below.
Between the Middle School and High School. (Please drive in from the East by the baseball field.)
Alberta Creek and Washita Point drop-off will be @ Lighthouse United Methodist Church Parking Lot.
Woodville Area drop-off will be @ Bay Point Baptist Church Parking Lot.
Caney Creek Area drop-off will be @ Caney Creek Community Center Parking Lot.
Enos drop-off will be @ the Enos Fire Department Parking Lot.
Powell drop-off will be @ Powell Church of Christ Parking Lot.
Willis area drop-off will be @ Catfish Platter Parking Lot.
Buncombe Creek drop-off will be @ Texoma Baptist Church Parking Lot.
